original_text: and saw the God of Israel. Under his feet was something like a pavement made of lapis lazuli, as bright blue as the sky.
korean_text: 이스라엘의 하나님을 보니 그의 발 아래에는 청옥을 편 듯하고 하늘 같이 청명하더라

sentences.original_text: and saw the God of Israel.
Under his feet was something like a pavement
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 발 아래에는 바닥과 같은 것이 있었다

sentences.original_text: as bright blue as the sky.
